author: devaviral
content: Hey guys, if people are working on the same project then do we have to submit a single proposal?

author: mariohavel
content: Yes, if you are working together on a single thing, you should be co-author the project proposal

author: devaviral
content: thanks, what the tentative proposal deadline? around 7 Aug?

author: mariohavel
content: Rather end of that week, general recommendation is 4-5 week of the fellowship. Checkout the template of dev updates https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-four/blob/master/development-updates.md
